name: Zubat
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.effect: Remove a number of damage counters from Zubat equal to the damage done to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If Zubat has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
